forum.content:
老實說我是因為看一個狗狗對人撒嬌的 video clip 才去找這首歌，才發現她還不錯

歌詞很甜，聲音很舒服，唱功很厲害

歌詞終究是歌詞，若有，就真的是真愛，一定要珍惜

urls.description: Mindy Gledhill and her guitarist, Joe Corcoran, perform "All the Pennies" live in Joe's studio in Si
urls.title: Mindy Gledhill - All the Pennies (Live Music Video)
